HasInitialPage
public bool HasInitialPage

Boolean to check if has initial Page, if has it Start the initial Page and Enable the Tome Navigation

HasEvents

Boolean to check if has Events related to Tome functions

HasInfinity
public bool HasInfinity

Bolean to check if has Infinity, means that when comes to the last page the next will be the first. and so on.

HasEnd
public bool HasEnd

Boolean to check if need to close Tome when Cancel Action is pressed in FirstPage
